frameset.edef: To be bored or fed up

example.parse: (S (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P سئمنا) (NP-SBJ-3 (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG المخادعة)) (CONJ و) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الرياء)) (CONJ و) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الابتزاز)) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN وقوف)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC امام) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مكتب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شؤون) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الطلاب)))))))

arg.g: Deceit and hypocrisy, and extortion, and parking in front of the Office of Student Affairs

example.arg: المخادعة و الرياء و الابتزاز و وقوف امام مكتب شؤون الطلاب
